name: Pipe
description: Cigarettes can be put into the pipe, because there is a filter on it, which can reduce the harm to the body. Smoking is harmful to the health of the human body, and the juveniles are prohibited from smoking.

name: Pipe Warm Home
description: "Kids still look forward to seeing the flowing shining in the night sky when they're held in their mothers' arms". (Use it to create a dazzling firework. )
